subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Catcher Ramón Castro received a cortisone injection in his lower back Monday to soothe an onset of arthritis that sidelined him Sunday, the same day that Paul Lo Duca was placed on the disabled list.
snippet: Catcher Ramón Castro received a cortisone injection in his lower back Monday to soothe an onset of arthritis that sidelined him Sunday, the same day that Paul Lo Duca was placed on the disabled list.
